system.description:
Crafting Components: Adamantine shackles that have bound a creature of CR 9 or higher

Requires attunement by a spellcaster

While holding this wand, you can use an action to expend charges to cast one of the following spells, using your spell save DC: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.ztgij3hd5gktogqt]{Hold Person} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.geix9369vzozz4zm]{Hold Monster} (5 charges). Alternatively, when you attempt to escape a grapple or are making a saving throw to avoid being paralyzed or restrained, you can use your reaction to expend 1 charge and gain advantage.

This wand has 7 charges and regains [[/r 1d6+1 #charges]] expended charges each dawn. When the last charge is expended, roll a [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, the wand folds in on itself until it disappears.
